mathTool
Class ScanString

java.lang.Object
  mathTool.ScanString
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParseFunction
public class ScanString
extends java.lang.Object

This class is similar to the ScanWord class, except it scans a string for keywords rather than an input stream.

Version:
$Revision$, $Date$
Author:
Leigh Brookshaw
